website_summaries.verdict: This mat's 18 oz puncture-resistant vinyl makes it one of the best for martial arts and other high-impact sports.
pros: The sleek all-black color option is a great choice for quick and easy cleanup after a long day of activity
Many of the lighter colored mats are more prone to enduring stains than this mat's black finish
cons: Some complained that the stitching was not as solid as it should be

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a streatching mst for my office. I do crossfit so I find it helps to take 10min and stretch a day so naturally its been sitting on the floor completely unused other than the first week I got it. Today I grabbed the handle to slide it forward a little as it was in the way and the handle stiching completely gave way with little to no force. Not impressed and I can't find manufacturer contact info for the warranty. The stiching isn't great on the panels but for my needs I was able to look past that .
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Best Mat Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This review is written by my 9 year old daughter who uses the mat the most. This is a very good mat. If you fall on your knees it doesn't hurt, there is so much padding. The only thing I don't like about it is the fact that it slides on the hardwood floors. Otherwise it is very good. I think it is a good quality mat because the padding is thick and the covering is also thick. My friends and I have made up 3 different routines together.
customer_reviews.author: Erin B.

customer_reviews.title: SMH over this MAT
customer_reviews.text: Up until yesterday, I would have given this mat a 5 star. It tore! Thought that after reading reviews it would be more durable. The mat is dense, without much give, which is good for gymnastics, but the outer material should be MUCH thicker. Of course, the return window ended yesterday. Will there ever be TRULY QUALITY PRODUCTS sold in America again?
customer_reviews.author: LAWS

customer_reviews.title: Great mat for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in Black to add to our collection. This is by far the best mat that we have gotten for the price. My daughter is currently working on her back walkovers and this mat has the perfect thickness to cushion her without having her sink into it. The Velcro on it is very sturdy and in various spots to connect it to other mats. We also love using it for fort building! I will definitely be purchasing another one of these mats in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Discowoodchuck

customer_reviews.title: Different color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these mats on 10/15 and liked it so much I ordered 3 more on 10/28 (via order again tab) as a Christmas gift to make it larger. The three arrived in a totally different color. Notice attached pictures. Please advsie how we can rectify this situsation. When ordering a 5th mat it also showed up in a 3rd color. Very disappointed that they do not match. Thank you for your attention to this matter.
customer_reviews.author: WOfficer

customer_reviews.title: Leaves Note with Each Package to Incentivize Reviews But Does NOT follow through
customer_reviews.text: Meh. The mats themselves are fine. Nothing great, nothing bad. What is worth nothing though is that I purchased 3 of these mats for my home. In each of the 3 shipments, the mats each came with a note stating that if you left a review on Amazon and then emailed the provided email address, some free sample would be sent to you. Given that I had 3 of these notes, I reviewed the product and emailed as instructed. Nothing. Nada. Zip. Look, I would have left a review anyways. But the fact that the manufacturer or seller included that note plus an incentive and then left the consumer hanging is pure garbage.
customer_reviews.author: JSHOPPER

customer_reviews.title: One of the best
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these mats for our daughter to practice her tumbling. We had purchased a previous set which were more expensive and the quality was fair/poor. We sent them back and checked reviews and purchased these. So glad we did. They are very, VERY well made and the support/cushion they provide is the best we’ve experienced in any training facility. Because of their cushion and support her tumbling is improving much faster because if she falls the mats cushion that fall, the others did not. You will not be disappointed purchasing these mats!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Wiegand

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs--big but folds up easily!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter started gymnastics and to stop her from tumbling off the couches and bed, I thought I should get her a gymnastics mat. I did not expect them to be so expensive (overall, not just this brand) so figured I'd at least get a large one for the money so upgraded to this size from my original smaller one. SO glad I did because it fits perfectly in the hallway and the living room and is big enough to really feel comfortable 'going for it' and not feeling like you are going to fall off the side. Seems sturdy, well-made, nice material. Exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lela

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality product
customer_reviews.text: Got this mat for our kids to practice gymnastics with at home and it works great. Sturdy and easy to fold and light enough at the same time to make it easy to fold up and put away. We got the solid black and it is easy to clean and functions well. We also use it from time to time as a comfortable mat to sit on and play board games on with the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mat, very soft
customer_reviews.text: This product is very nice, a bit more soft than i was expecting, but I'd say that's very nice in this case. As thick as it is, it's perfect for our needs. My wife is a bit thin, and sometimes has issues doing push ups or situps on the hard floor or even carpet, due to bone discomfort. This isn't an issue with this mat. We're bought one to start, and are getting more to cover our gym room floor.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Seams Coming Apart
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 3 months ago for my daughter to practice tumbling on (she only weighs 50 pounds) and the seams are all ripping apart. I am very disappointed with how poorly this mat has held up. I would not recommend this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Suitable mats for Jiu Jitsu drilling
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these mats to drill jiu jitsu with a friend. They feel very similar in quality to the expensive mats that my gym uses. They fold easily and are lightweight to carry. The velcro holds the two mats together with no issues so far. Definitely would recommend a couple of these to anyone who wants to practice sweeps or light rolling outside of the public gym.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Product Sent
customer_reviews.text: Really like the product. I ordered it twice but the second order was when I received the correct product which let me see what was missed the first time. I've included a picture of the small deal I received the first time. Didn't have as much space the first time and the quality is really nice. I just made the assumption that it was a lot smaller than I thought. Now with much more space I wanted two of these but don't want to now purchase 3 mats. Good product but pay attention to what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Public Name

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This mat is relatively inexpensive and easy to use, so I do think worth considering. We use it for home jiu jitsu, and the pebbled surface is nice for grappling. We also has a we sell mats with a thicker vinyl smooth covering, which is harder to slide and move on. The padding is soft, so suitable for take downs. I would not recommend this mat for standing martial arts, it's too soft and not durable enough. After less than two weeks of use, the fabric is tearing in some corners. I would not leave this mat down all the time or walk around on it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: pfw

customer_reviews.title: Awesome panel mat, love the 4x10 size!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great panel mat!!! We have this to my daughter for Christmas and she was so excited! She is a former competitive gymnast and has so many ideas of how to use this! The size is wonderful! She was able to do two back hand-springs in a row and stay on the mat the whole time. It’s long enough for an aerial as well. She folded one side so that hree panels were stacked and started practicing her over splits. The foam is great quality. I am thinking of purchasing another to attach via the Velcro on it so it can be even wider. Our other daughters were loving it too! What a great product!
customer_reviews.author: 6Ford

customer_reviews.title: Large and Firm...ehm.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not into gymnastics but I wanted a new mat for my stretching and core exercises. This thing works great, I like that it is less squishy than my previous mat. I wasn't dissatisfied with my previous mat, just wanted an additional for my girlfriends place but they upped the price of it by $25! This mat is larger, and firmer for less $$. Only complaint is what you can see in the pic, mine arrived with an indention which may have punctured. Not Amazon or GoGyms responsibility and not that bad so it's a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: LoX

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistant sizes
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of these mats. 2 of them are the same size, the other two of a few inches smaller in both length and width. That's actually a big issue when trying to velcro them together. I contacted the manufacturer and they said there is nothing they can do and to just call amazon. I really wish this particular issue could be solved, because other than that, they are great.
customer_reviews.author: david costa

customer_reviews.title: Good product not the best fabric
customer_reviews.text: The product is a good product Great density and good shock absorption . But they only thing I dislike is it came with a bunch of lines indented into it and it's fabric isn't that durable it starts to stretch and leave bubbles areas within the day and we only used it for an hour and now have spot to trip on.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for - Quality product here.
customer_reviews.text: I received exactly what I expected. This gym mat reminds me of the gym mats from my school days and I know those things were durable since countless kids would tumble on them. I ordered the black one for my baby that is learning to crawl and I have no problems. Easy to clean. Looks good. Easy to pack up. Just need to find a suitable spot to store when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous tumbling mat!  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this well made large folding mat for our 3.5 year old grand daughter. She has an acrobat class and loves to practice at home. Since we have all hard tile floors, we needed to purchase a mat to protect her when she is doing her cartwheels, rolls etc... The mat arrived within days and within minutes we had it ready for use. If you have a little (or big!) gymnastics lover, this is the perfect solution or gift! Our grand daughter literally spent hours on this mat the day it arrived. Will update soon with photo-- and comments on durability. Our son is now going to buy one for his house!
customer_reviews.author: Sewdolling

customer_reviews.title: Good mat exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: The mat has a nice give to it for cushioning but does not bottom out on the padding even with a larger adult using it. This was a purchase for my daughter to use for home dance and gymnastic classes during the covid lock down but I can see it being used for general day to day practice as well. It is easy to store (Slides behind our love-seat almost perfectly) and easy to get out and use (or five year old can do it). The covering seems durable and the stitching has not has any issues after over a months usage. If anything happens I will update the review to reflect that but I am not anticipating any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Insert reviewer name here

customer_reviews.title: My joints are much happier
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these mats to go on a concrete floor for exercising. Provides great cushion if you are doing exercises on the ground or anything that involves jumping/high impact. My joints have been much happier. The outer plastic of the mat is not tightly sculpted to the inner cushion so there is some movement and some wrinkling which might bother some people. For a mat at this price point don't expect it to be like the high dollar mats at most gyms. Cant say much for durability because I havent had them for very long but cat and dog have walked across them and didnt poke holes or leave scratches. Serves its purpose well in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: PeachyKeen

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied. Great gymnastics mat
customer_reviews.text: This product came exactly as described. It produced a nice 4ft by 10ft space for my daughter and I to do gymnastics on. It's large enough that I can practice summersaults and hand stands with room to fall forward if needed. We did not see any of the unfortunate quality issues that were mentioned in other reviews. The cover was tear free and tight to the mat. The stitching was clean and and the mat sections sit tightly together so there was no major gaps produced where it folds. Overall we are very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emily G.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly suprised!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 12 and 14 years old daughters. One competes in gymnastics and the other in Taekwon Do. They do conditioning every day and especially need a matted area to practice in the house during bad weather days. All the mats looked sooo expensive! I found this one listed as used but let me tell you - it looked new out of the box! It was a birthday present for my girls as their birthdays are back to back. I have decided to go back to BalanceFrom and get another mat as there is room for it in their practice area! Thank you Balance Form- I am a hero today to my girls!
customer_reviews.author: R. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it - 8 year old who's around 100lbs and 3 yr old at 35lbs. They've had it for 2 months or so and there's no tears, dents, creases, etc. despite using it as a slide, a fort, and a number of other things that aren't really the intended purpose. It folds up well and is a bit cumbersome to carry but I don't think it's a design flaw and comes with the territory. 8 year old can have it in the house and flop all around and it keeps the house from shaking. The dog has tried a nibble and honestly it held up. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Mat Ripped Almost Immediately: Company Impossible to Reach
customer_reviews.text: This product ripped along an entire seam within 3 weeks of owning it. Since it comes with a 2 year warranty, I reached out to the company. I sent two emails and called twice (reaching a full voicemail box both times). I finally contacted Amazon. They tried to contact the company and could not reach them so they sent me a replacement mat. We'll see how the new mat holds up. However, I would not recommend ordering anything from this company.
customer_reviews.author: TDB

customer_reviews.title: Quarantine jiujitsu approved
customer_reviews.text: Possibly the only thing keeping me sane during social distancing...doing jiujitsu with my girlfriend. I got two of these, they give me the necessary room we need to drill and roll; and they stick together perfectly through velcro. They fold up easily and they are easy to clean. 1. If we would only drill, maybe, and just maybe, one of them is enough...but you'd be limited if you're inverting from certain angles, etc. 2. Two of these are perfect for rolling. A third piece wouldn't even fit in our apartment, so two was the sweet number. Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Ignacio @NutraHouse

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old granddaughter has not stopped tumbling and rolling since we got this for her. She even has parents take it to the park and she puts it under the cross bar so she can swing up high and shoot off of it. She says it is so "cushiony". It is well made. I'd recommend this for any grandparent who's looking for a fun and creative gift that keeps on giving. It's bit but easy to fold but she never has it folded because it's so fun to flip around on.
customer_reviews.author: Gramja

customer_reviews.title: 1 out of 3 defective.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three mats and one was short about 2.5 inches. The other two were ten feet exactly. Didn't make the uniform 10x12 jiu jitsu space I was looking for. A bit concerned about the gaps between mats too. Can only get them together so flush. Took almost a month to get them. Will they work? Sure.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: It depends what you need it for.
customer_reviews.text: I got the pink beatiful mat with the 2 inch cushion. My daughters love it! They use it to practice gymnastics/tumbling. Unfortunately, the material is very sensitive that it got a small tear the first time they used it. I was very disappointed. Maybe I just needed something heavy duty that can help with their tumbling.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect way for our gymnastics-loving kids to keep active during the shut-down.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this shortly after the COVID-18 shut-down began, so our gymnastics loving 12 and 13 year olds could keep up the fun at home. With the YMCA closed, they had nowhere to practice their craft. This mat made them SO happy! And it's lasted through several months of them folding and unfolding, dragging it inside and out. (And they aren't exactly "easy" on it.) So durability is great. We have zero complaints and expect this will continue to satisfy for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: W. Willard

customer_reviews.title: Gets hot in sunlight use in shade if possible
customer_reviews.text: Big and sturdy. A nice amount of padding. I intended to orient it partly on the wall and partly on the floor. It just doesn't want to do that. I would also recommend getting a lightish color if it will be by a window. It gets very hot in the sun. My kid likes to sprawl out on it and color sometimes and we had a molten crayon event. It was pretty bad. There are velcro tabs on one side, they attract a lot of fuzzies, part of being on the floor
customer_reviews.author: Sander W. Koning

customer_reviews.title: Large, firm mat; perfect for martial arts
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this mat for our daughters to practice their sparring and mat work now that martial art (and everything else) has gone virtual. We were surprised at how large and what high quality it is. It is just soft enough to cushion their many falls but firm enough underfoot for sparring. We shopped around quite a lot since these mats can be quite expensive and decided to try this mat because of the great price and promising reviews. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wilder Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Family Mat
customer_reviews.text: Great mat! I’m starting to use it and I feel this is a good purchase in this time where we need to social distance our selves and gyms are closed! It’s easy to clean, easy to fold! If I had a bigger space, I would’ve bought two to have some rolls with my family. Right now is only used for training drills and certain exercises that don’t require bigger space. Even my daughter is using it for her cheer and tumbling exercises, which is super cool!!
customer_reviews.author: Markon

customer_reviews.title: Slippery
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's feet slip when she's doing her tumbling. It is very disappointing. It's a big expense for a product that is not working as it should. It could cause an injury to my child. I would return it if it was a smaller product. We have learned to adapt to it. I bought another brand and the other brand is excellent, so my daughter begins her tumbling on the other mat and ends her tumbling on this mat. It is extremely bothersome that we have to work around it.
customer_reviews.author: Zoraida Rivas

customer_reviews.title: ok but not great quality
customer_reviews.text: The mat is usable but as you can see from the pictures, the covering is not tight across the foam pads. There is a bit of extra material, causing wrinkles and a little movement of the cover material against the foam. I worry that the motion of the cover material will cause the top covering material to tear sooner.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected...worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I have hardwood floors through out my house and needed a mat where my girls can do their dance, acro and martial arts classes. This was bigger than I anticipated, the cushion is perfect and just enough. I bought two for each kid and probably only needed one since they are a good size but it is great that they attach seamlessly, don't move when they are together. The girls love it and if I had more room I would purchase more!
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home practice
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect mat for practicing gymnastic skills at home. It is very lightweight, easy to fold, carry, and store. It but also very firm and sturdy. It has just the right amount of firmness for practicing handsprings (no bounce, but not too hard either). The mat is also really long, so there is enough length to execute skills. I would definitely recommend this for anyone wanting to practice gymnastic skills at home.
customer_reviews.author: ATC

customer_reviews.title: Great mat for stretching
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat to use for stretching. It is a little larger than I needed but I didn't see smaller in this quality. The mat is firm and comfortable to lie on to stretch. I don't like the velcro around the edges but that is needed if I wanted to attach another mat. I may buy some velcro to attach on top if it started to cause problems. So far it is fine and made well. I really like that it has handles so it is easier to carry.
customer_reviews.author: DAH0808

customer_reviews.title: 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mat and my daughter LOVES it! It's thick and the cover seems to be very durable. My dog stepped on it (big doberman who's nails need to be done) and there was absolutely no effect on this mat at all. I was worried that he would poke a hole in it. It's a great product and I also like that others can be purchased and hooked onto it with the velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight dense and durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this at the beginning of quarantine to be able to continue my jiu jitsu workouts at home. This mat far exceeded my expectations for the price. It’s super light but the foam is very high density which offers great cushioning and peace of mind even on my tile floors. I’m able to sprawl and break-fall (both a very high impact with the ground) with no worry of hurting myself. The material is also proving to be very durable as it is showing no wear after 2+ months of use and constant sliding across the mat. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mats
customer_reviews.text: I used them instantly after they arrived and wrestled for a good hr and a half on them. I bought 3 of them and all three stay together with the velcro and the velcro attaches very nicely to carpet too. Never had an issue with it slipping or separating. The mats feel like really good quality and seem to last a long time. The padding is firm but also soft. You can get slammed on this mat and still feel fine.
customer_reviews.author: Etienne baber

customer_reviews.title: Good looking & supportive tumbling mat!
customer_reviews.text: I spent an embarrassing amount of time researching tumbling mats. Based on reviews, I decided to go with the 10’ black mat and am so happy with our decision! It stays put on our carpet and has enough form support. It’s easy to clean and looks great! It’s a great value too!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for the perfect mat for exercise and finally found it! I bought a different one previously but it was not as nice as this one. It arrived quickly and was better than I expected. It was so nice I actually bought a second one to have even more space to move while I work out. I haven't had it long enough to know how it will hold up in the long run but will update later.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ritchey

customer_reviews.title: They are okay. Not for Personal Training.
customer_reviews.text: Great mats the only thing is that the surface of the mats moves a lot. The lining of it seems like it will rip if I apply to much pressure to the mats. Example. I use my mats for exercise. I did a sumo squat on the mat and my feet kept slipping because the cover of the mats are loose and move when you move your feet.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bodyweight workouts, yoga, and stretching
customer_reviews.text: Great size for the price. My bodyweight exercises are much better on my joints using this mat. Quality is good and it's not too heavy so you can fold it up and move around easily. If you have it on tile, it might move around a bit while you're working out so I placed it under a mat and the velcro sides attaches to the mat to keep it in place. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rick J

customer_reviews.title: Good gym mat
customer_reviews.text: Good gym mat. Perfect size at 4'x10'. It's big enough for my 8 year old daughter. 1" thickness feels safe and provides enough cushion when she's playing on it. 4 folds make it neat and easy to organize your space. Two handles are convenient too. The hardness is good. Not too hard neither too soft. Just perfect. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: My First Impression of the folding mat
customer_reviews.text: We were pleased with how quickly the mat arrived. The quality of the stitching seems to be sturdy. It even seems thicker than we thought it would be. Fingers crossed that this will hold up to seasons of use by my American Ninja Warrior daughter. We have an obstacle course built for her in our backyard and this mat will come in handy to cushion her when and if she falls..
customer_reviews.author: Perry Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not great mat
customer_reviews.text: My favorite part of this mat is that it’s bouncy and does not slide (or maybe just a little that it isn’t really noticeable. But what I really didn’t like is that after using this for a few weeks, it’s starting to become loose from e foam. What I mean is that it seems like the mat fabric stretched and did not bounce back (just imagine saggy skin). Definitely wouldn’t buy it again
customer_reviews.author: JanL

customer_reviews.title: Great support and size
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent tumbling mat which is large enough for 2 people to workout together on. Finally can do jumping jacks without any pain with the thick cushion beneath me. Enough support without sinking in to help alleviate sit up pains in spine from regular yoga/exercise mats. This stays in place and has Velcro underneath to add on additional mats if you choose. Easy cleanup and waterproof. Big Enough for almost 5yo to run/flip/jumps and excited for her own mat. Easily folds up and has handles to carry and put it up and out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: He Is Truth

customer_reviews.title: Good overall mats
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for martial arts training and find them to be well built and durable enough to handle our abuse. I really like the extra velcro fastening strips on the bottom of the third mat that is designed to connect to the top of the overlap material from the first mat (also velcro mountable) . Good design, great quality, great price!!! Will purchase these again when I need to replace the ones I have or create more training area in the Dojo.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great gym mat
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our granddaughter because she's started cheer gym private lessons. She loves it! This mat gives her a place at home to practice and when she's not using it, it gives the boys a padded place to romp. I was really surprised at the size and the thickness of the mat when it arrived. It's a great product and well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Just bought a second Mat
customer_reviews.text: Got one and it was great. light weight easy to move around has Velcro flaps in the side which allows you to add more mats and not have them slip. Excellent for kids who wanna try gymnastics at home. I'm buying a second mat . I hope the material on the outside is durable, that's my only concern but its too early to comment about that.
customer_reviews.author: gadget guy

customer_reviews.title: It clearly takes the place of my time at the gym, which is closed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my BFGR-01PP Gymnastics Folding Exercise Aerobics Mat in Mid-March. Little did I know the building crisis would make this Mat an important part of my exercise routine when my club shut down. It is an improvement over what was available at the club! It is now quite an important tool for my routine. And it folds up nicely so that it stays in the basement without a problem. It is a winner! Thank you. Karen Storck and Miles Snyder
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Jiu Jitsu
customer_reviews.text: 2 attached together are the perfect size for practicing Jiu Jitsu at home. Not too soft that you'd sink into like a gymnast mat, but not too firm either which makes falls comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jellowiggles

customer_reviews.title: Best Mat I ever owned. No more yoga mat
customer_reviews.text: I really do love this mat. It's very durable to the point where you can really tumble, flip, split, jump up real high and not hurt yourself in the process. The worst thing is to feel the floor underneath when doing floor exercises. It folds easily and can be tucked under the bed or leaned up against the wall. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: EbonyEyes39

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product!!! I got it for my 3 yr old to do gymnastics at home on during quarantine, and he was SO excited about it. So far it has been perfect for fort making, doing “cool tricks” and just bouncing off the walls in general, but the quality is clearly good enough that as he continues to learn more complicated things that really require a soft but stable surface, this will continue to be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nellie

customer_reviews.title: Balancefrom gogym 4'×10' mat
customer_reviews.text: Bought the balancefrom gogym 4'×10' mat for my 8 yr old to practice her tumbling on. She loves it. It's a really good size. The mat is a good firm thickness. It doesn't sink in when you stand on it. She loves that it came in pink! It has handles that make it easy to fold it up and carry. I like that it has the Velcro strips on the sides to attach more mats to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But this and so you don’t waste your time looking anywhere else!
customer_reviews.text: Like the title says, don’t waste your time looking any where else. We have looked at multiple different folding mats between eight and 10 feet and this one has all the features that you are looking for. This may has awesome support for your kids especially if they do gymnastics, which is very important on hardwood floors. Stitching, leather, and foam appear to be high quality. Multiple mats can be connected with the built in Velcro using either the long side or end (for tumblers). Our kids love it and so will you!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Way better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Got two and I'm super impressed with the quality these seem to be made with. I've had many grappling mats over the years in my gym and at home. When I saw the price, I thought no way. Got two for home practice. I'll get back to you at a later date to let you know how they are holding up. 8/5/20 So far I'm sold!
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: I bought formats it cost approximately $360 it measures 14 x 12 with a little gap shown in the pictures. I originally bought two mats and rolled Brazilian Jiu Jitsu. We would fall off the mats. With 4 mats you can easily spar at 100%.. I have only had them for a few weeks so I cannot talk about the durability but it has a two year warranty. Hopefully I will not have to use that. So far I’m really happy with the Velcro the mats do not detach at all. I think they will be easy to transport as well
customer_reviews.author: S. Majithia

customer_reviews.title: Great but bizarre
customer_reviews.text: I’d give them five stars; however... I ordered two of them. I received 2, but they are different sizes by about 6 inches lengthwise. Also, seem to be different thickness and tautness of the covering. Also one is double seamed in the middle and the other is not. Clearly the smaller one is of better quality. Bizarre. But put through 45 min of hard rolling and they worked great.
customer_reviews.author: McBud

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase and great value!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these mats and love them! They are high quality and the perfect density for our daughter's gymnastics practice at home. These mats are well-constructed...great stitching, well-placed velcro to connect the mats to one another, and soft yet strong, vinyl covering. This was an excellent purchase and the price was great too! I'd buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Periodic Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, light, great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my youngest son who does gymnastics. Him and his brother also wrestle on it. It has held up amazingly! It's easy to put away even my 7 yo can fold it and put it away. Easy to clean too. Our cats have even put their claws in it a few times but you cant tell and the material hasn't ripped. Wonderful buy!!
customer_reviews.author: romancereader

customer_reviews.title: It’s a dream
customer_reviews.text: I’m too lazy to unfold but the big version of this is huge ! Exactly what I wanted and glad I picked this one. Works perfect for her bars and a rumbling mat. She loves the color and feels better flipping now. If you want something for your bars and a lengthy tumbling bad this is it. Nice and firm and thick. Great buy and I know it I need another where I’m getting mine.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for buck.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for money. These mats are exactly what I was looking for. They are perfect for a home gym and some casual rolling. These mats so far, have proven to be a great investment as they fold up easily and stack away without any effort. I’ll be purchasing one more to increase my mat space. If you’re looking for value for money and bang for buck. These are the mats you want.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Great mat for acro
customer_reviews.text: This mat is perfect for my 9 year old daughter to practice her handstands, roundoffs, somersaults, cartwheels, etc. It is a nice size....not too big, not too small. I especially like that you can add more mats to the attached velcro to make a bigger practice area. So far, it seems very sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: mmphenry

customer_reviews.title: excellent padded workout mat for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these totaling 120 sq ft of padded workout area. These mats are ideal for Taekwondo work outs, tumbling and used in conjunction with a heavy bag. Firm padding makes it easy on the feet and heels. I do some exercises bare foot and others with socks. Again, primarily used for Taekwondo workouts. Good pad for the money and an affordable way to get some padded floor coverage. highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MWAD

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price. Prefer denser foam, but costs more.
customer_reviews.text: Size is right, price is competitive, material is easily cleaned, good strong Velcro. Works out fine for the kids and I. I wouldn't recommend adults doing full on sparring with hard takedowns. A little on the side side. Would prefer it to be denser. If you try to balance on one foot, the foam sinks, making it more difficult to balance.
customer_reviews.author: Charles S

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the low price.
customer_reviews.text: After my daughter begged and pleaded for a tumbling mat I gave in and ordered this mat. She's on the junior high Cheer squad, she wanted to use when practicing stunts. It is a great quality mat. I thought for the low price it would be thin and not sturdy. But I was wrong. I would encourage anyone on the fence to make the purchase you will be pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: tinalou

customer_reviews.title: Great for BJJ
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one and I'm waiting on a third in the mail. I bought one to try out and was amazed at the quality your getting for the price. I do Brazilian jiu jitsu and the padding in these mats is thick enough for takedowns and falls. Other mats the same size are double the price, amazed at the quality of these
customer_reviews.author: Antonios Azer

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: So far these have held up pretty well with durability. I have gotten three of these for my two toddlers to play on in their play room. I appreciate the safety aspect that these seem to be very sturdy and well built for my little ones to jump on. ! Thank you for the high quality product. Excited to look into more products from your company!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher D.

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Solo Jiu Jitsu, wrestling, grappling drills
customer_reviews.text: I use two of these purely for solo grappling drills and body weight exercises (and maybe the occasional kettle bell). It's been some months and it's held up well. Folds away easily. Is comfy on the joints. If you plan on rolling/wrestling hard on on these, I can see them getting worked and maybe giving in.
customer_reviews.author: Aidin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality mat for tumbling!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received her tumbling mat today! We’ve only had it for about 3 hours but I couldn’t wait to give you our review! The product was packaged great. My daughter picked the purple mat and it looks exactly like the color online. It’s bright and just a really pretty color in general! She is using this to practice her tumbling, she does competitive cheerleading. She had it outside then brought it inside, we had to wipe it down already it it wiped clean very easily. So far it seems very durable. I know my daughter is extremely satisfied with this purchase, which makes me one satisfied mom for this mat!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Jump Around
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son who’s always jumping around and tumbling. This is definitely a great product was shipped on time the box was huge because of course the mat is huge. It was shipped with no damages. The box was beat up but luckily the actual mat had no issues. My son loves it when ever he wants to wrestle, jump around or flip he pulls his mat out. I’m so happy we purchased this for him.
customer_reviews.author: Pepperina’s World

customer_reviews.title: Great All Purpose Exerise Mat!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has a gymnastics gym set up in the garage and this mat is perfect. My daughter has placed it under her balance beam and it fits perfectly and is stable enough to hold the beam without wobbling. Before we set it up in my daughter's gym I used it for a couple yoga sessions at home and it was perfect. Great size and comfortable to use! I am considering purchasing another one to create a yoga area in the garage for myself! My only complaint was that It took forever to arrive! We purchased it on April 22 and it arrived May 15th!
customer_reviews.author: Dotz

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect for a family home gym
customer_reviews.text: I really love this. It’s incredibly thick and durable. Very well made. I don’t feel the floor below me. I would highly recommend this to anyone with small children or adults looking to do some Yoga/stretching. It’s perfect for low intensity activity. Folds up nice and easy and has a good surface that allows you to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: RajKelus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your at home gym
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these mats at home for jiu jitsu since our whole family practices and gyms are closed due to Covid-19. We didn't want to get out of shape and these are perfect for drilling and even rolling! We purchased 3. They are easy to clean, firm, stay locked together with the velcro, and seem to be very durable. For the price, these are just as good as mats costing twice as much or even more!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi V

customer_reviews.title: Good, but will not last!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these while the world locked down from the coronavirus. Product was very comfortable for jujitsu. However, the seams will tear. Mine lasted a whole 3 months. Although they have a lengthy warranty, I called the company to file the claim. No one ever picked up, only a lone answering machine. I left my info expecting a call back. It's been a month later and no once has called back. I can understand being closed during the lockdown, but we are past that with many companies open. Save your money and buy better quality, and manufacturer backing.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the home gymnast!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect thickness for gymnasts. It’s longer than I imagined, but it’s worked out really well. This could be used in grass, carpet or hardwoods. It has Velcro strips on the sides to attach to other pieces should you want a wider mat. All in all one of the best purchases I’ve made this year!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Thiergart

customer_reviews.title: Great quality/fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this pad for our 6 year daughter to place under her gymnastics bar. It fits perfectly! It also folds out to twice the size of the picture so she can practice floor stuff on it. It arrived super fast and was exactly as pictured! The quality seems to be really good and my daughter loves the pink color. Because our daughter is new to bars we might need to get something else a little softer to go over it until we’re confident she will not fall. This floor pad is worth every penny though!
customer_reviews.author: Reggie fisher

customer_reviews.title: A must to have for every gymnast!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my great niece who takes gymnastics lessons!! She is 10 and uses it everyday both indoors and outdoors. She finds it easy to open and close and store away, which stores easily with little space!! Needless to say, her friends in the class are all purchasing one!! Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Jmd

customer_reviews.title: At home bjj
customer_reviews.text: This is my first mat for home... But in my opinion I think its great for the price. It is light which makes it easy to move around but seems sturdy enough to take the abuse... I just got it so time will tell... The 10x4 dimension is a little small for my purpose so I will be buying another to Velcro together with my current mat. The quality of foam seems great I can do rolls without hurting myself. It feels like the mats at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: John Biedakiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Overall very good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for the grandchildren to play on in the basement. Had them for a couple months, overall we are very happy with them. There are a few loose threads on the seams, they seem to be tails that were not cut off, but does make one leary about long-term durability of seams.
customer_reviews.author: Elmo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I just started my kid in Judo class bought these mats so they can practice at home. they survived her falling practice and me showing her how to do falling practice so far. I've seen no problems with the seams as of yet and the material has survived my dog running and chewing bones on it, despite me trying to keep my dog away from it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mat for my daughter to practice her gymnastics. I have not had any issues with it and she uses it everyday. It is light weight but still thick and not too soft. I would definitely recommend this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Wemhoener-Cuite

customer_reviews.title: Materific
customer_reviews.text: Amazing mat, we bought the pink one too and that one already has a hole in it. My kids are demons so a hole is to be expected but the purple one somehow remains intact although i've only had them for like a month or so. With that being said my 7 year old uses the thing all day everyday so it does hold up well. It is a really good gymnastics mat, stay away from the pink one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super thick mat
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this mat to go with our TJ Fitness Training bar and I must’ve missed the dimensions when I placed my order. I was surprised to see how far the mat extended past the bar. My wife said just fold that thing in half and she was right. The mat is a perfect fit in the bar and it is now double thick giving our daughter some extra support. She’s been using the mat for about a month now and we don’t see any issues with its durability.
customer_reviews.author: sozavac

customer_reviews.title: Nice mat
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Got this for our 6 year old to do tumbling on. His favorite thing to do right now is fold one side up so he can jump over the "mountain". It's holding up to that. It is easy to fold, lightweight for easy moving and storing, and the covering and stitching seems durable. I'm hoping we will enjoy this may for a lot of years.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Mann

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter. She loves it. Very durable and appears to be made out of quality material. **NOTE** There was a delay in delivery. USPS said it was returned because of "Undeliverable as addressed: Attempted-Not Known" even though we've lived here for years and the mail did not come that day. After 3 days - Wallah! The package appeared!!
customer_reviews.author: texassports1

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of the blue mats! They are so thick and beautiful! Slight issue is that they are not the same size!! The one is a bit bigger (longer) than the other. Quality control?? Would definitely buy again though! Great for ab exercises and yoga! Not great for aerobic jumping as you would sink in them. Packaging was awesome! Wrapped in plastic and boxed.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: So Far so Great!
customer_reviews.text: My 8-year old wanted a tumbling mat for her birthday, so we ordered this one. It appears to be very high quality material and well made. All the kids and their friends have been enjoying it this past week. It seems to measure up to the mats we've used in the gymnastics center and the color is beautiful. it has velcro tabs to attach additional mats if you choose. I can't attest to the long-term wear yet, but really seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: We've been looking to get a crash pad for climbing for our son, but he doesn't need anything super fancy and I prefer to have a larger pad. This one has worked great under the zip line, and now we bought another to take to some simple bouldering sites where he can climb and have something to break his short fall. Folds up easy.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia

customer_reviews.title: This is a great buy I need another one now
customer_reviews.text: Now that the Covid-19 is around my Jiu Jitsu/Judo gym that i regularly attend had shut down but a good friend decided to start doing virtual video training just to keep us stretching and exercising so that when things clear up we wont be too out of shape to jump back into the sport. After the first training I realized I needed a mat so I ordered this one. So far it has been great to use and abuse. It feels professional grade. I can practice throws, falls, ground work. Most of all my kids like it as well and my daughter practices gymnastics on it doing rolls cart wheels etc. Great over all experience!!
customer_reviews.author: monica helgesen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for active kids
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 2 of the pink mats and it’s been over a month and we LOVE them! The kids have used them for so many things. Gymnastics practice, obstacle courses, random play with toys and dolls & even to sleepover in each others rooms. We connect Two 4x10 mats make the perfect, designated space to move around in our family room.
customer_reviews.author: sgadecki

customer_reviews.title: Well made, and not too soft.  Folds easily and looks good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter, and we are very impressed. It is very well made and functions as expected. The things my daughter likes are: Good Size. Hard, not to soft and Squishy Easy to Store Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Madere

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great value
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this on a whim for our daughter and couldn't be happier. The mat feels like the one she uses at her tumbling class, and it's been in use non-stop since we received it. It's a pretty large mat, but folds up pretty easily and can be stored out of the way. The size and durability are great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE MATTS!
customer_reviews.text: The EPE foam is perfect. It's a bit firm and bouncy so you can do gymnastics, wrestling, jui jits etc without loosing your balance. But not too firm that it hurts to crash on. They aren't to squishy and not too firm. JUST RIGHT! PERFECT!! I am so stoked to have a little wrestling room in my house/apartment for me and my boys and my wife loves doing her workouts on here too. The matt's connect well together and the covers are the perfect amount of grip where you don't slip but don't get a rug burn. You can really keep your balancing on these matts. so happy I did this. I LOVE THESE MATTS
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Reeder

customer_reviews.title: Fits our needs and pretty color
customer_reviews.text: This mat was just what we were looking for. We wanted something to put under our daughters’ bar. This will add the protection we were looking for. It is also easy to move around so they can use it for the balance beam and floor work. I would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Koala

customer_reviews.title: Price Point to Quality is Spot On!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these during the Covid pandemic for our kids to have safer area to have higher energy play. Boy did these mats deliver. We practice gymnastics, online martial arts, and use them to make living room forts (if you remember from your childhood). The fold up nicely and don't take up too much space considering how much area they cover. And cleaning with a light soap is a cinch. Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Met.

product_meta.title: BalanceFrom GoGym All-Purpose 4'x10'x2 Extra Thick High Density Anti-Tear Gymnastics Gym Folding Exercise Aerobics Mats
product_meta.description:
Overview: 10 feet long 4 feet wide at 2-inch thick firm high density EPE foam is ideal for activities and exercises such as yoga, aerobics, Pilates, and martial arts and many more. Surface is made of non-toxic lead-free durable 18 oz puncture resistant and non-absorbent vinyl. Moisture resistant Technology makes the mat to be easily washed with soap and water. Velcro on all sides make it easy to hook several mats together to make a large workout area or tumbling run and securing folded shape. A foldable, 4 panel design and handles on each mat make it easy to store and transport your mat. 

Dimensions: Expanded Dimension: 10' x 4' x 2"; Folded Dimensions: 48" x 30" x 8". 10 feet long 4 feet wide at 2-inch thick firm high density EPE foam is ideal for activities and exercises such as yoga, aerobics, Pilates, and martial arts 

Warranty: All genuine BalanceFrom products come with a 2-year warranty and 100% BalanceFrom Satisfaction Guarantee to make your purchase worry free. Simply contact us or your vendor if you have any questions. Customer satisfaction is our highest priority. 

AT A GLANCE:
-10' x 4' x 2" extra large 
-Foldable, 4 panel design
-Easy storage and transportation
-2-year warranty
feature_bullets: 10 feet long 4 feet wide at 2-inch thick firm high Density EPE foam is ideal for activities and exercises such as yoga, aerobics, Pilates, and martial arts
Surface is made of non-toxic lead-free durable 18 oz puncture resistant and non-absorbent vinyl. Moisture resistant technology makes the mat to be easily washed with soap and water
Velcro on all sides make it easy to hook several mats together to make a large workout area or tumbling run and securing folded shape
A foldable, 4 panel design and handles on each mat make it easy to store and Transport your mat. Expanded dimension: 10' x 4' x 2"; folded dimensions: 48" x 30" x 8"
All genuine BalanceFrom products are covered by a 100% BalanceFrom satisfaction guarantee and 2-year BalanceFrom Warranty. Customer satisfaction is our highest priority
